Subject Line: New Data: Are Your Readers Taking the Right Cordyceps Dose?
Email Body:
Hi Dave,

I noticed your recent deep dive on nootropics and thought your audience would appreciate a more precise approach to functional mushrooms.

We've just launched the first-of-its-kind **Functional Mushroom Goal-Based Calculator** at Synervion. Unlike generic dosage advice, our tool uses science-backed data to recommend specific Cordyceps dosages based on activity level, energy needs, and health goals (Endurance, Recovery, Focus).

You can check it out here: [Link to Calculator]

It references our Science Hub for all claims. I'd love for you to share this as a resource for your readers who are looking to optimize their stack.

Best,
[Your Name]
